participant_abstract.sent: We are excited about getting the i-pod touchpad device on the remote and everyone brought good stuff to the table.
We talked about the target age range being about 19-35, the locator device being a buzzer, and making sure its useable.
Next step will be to get everything organized as to the conceptual design.
We need to figure out how we're going to design the touch pad and also what kind of functions it will have and be capable of.

participant_actions.sent: Chiara - can we afford the touchpad?
Chrissy - can we make the touchpad?
Me - best way to design touchpad for the user?

participant_decisions.sent: Keep it simple in terms of function.

participant_problems.sent: Unclear about if it needs to be useable with DVD/VCR.
